resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1852</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Geography of the Middle East</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie des Mittlere Ostens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de le Moyen-Orient</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de o Oriente Médio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di Medio Oriente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία της Μέσης Ανατολής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Geografía de el Oriente Medio</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A power point presentation which pictures the Geography of the Middle East, includes ideas on geographical paradigms, where and how the Middle east fits in, and many maps of the region.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">middle east</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">maps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paradigms</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Energie Punktdarstellung, der die Geographie
des Mittlere Ostens darstellt, enthält Ideen auf geographischen 
Paradigmen, in denen und wie der Mittler-Osten innen paßt, und viele 
Karten der Region.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation de point de puissance qui 
décrit la géographie de le Moyen-Orient, inclut des idées sur des 
paradigmes géographiques, où et comment le Moyen-Orient s'adapte 
dedans, et beaucoup de cartes de la région.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação do ponto da potência que 
retrata a geografia de o Oriente Médio, inclui idéias nos paradigms 
geográficos, onde e como o Oriente Médio cabe dentro, e muitos mapas
da região.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione del punto di potenza che 
descrive la geografia di Medio Oriente, include le idee sui paradigmi 
geografici, dove e come il Medio Oriente si adattare dentro e molti 
programmi della regione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρουσίαση Power Point που εικόνες η 
γεωγραφία της Μέσης Ανατολής, περιλαμβάνει τις ιδέες σχετικά με 
τα γεωγραφικά παραδείγματα, όπου και πώς η Μέση Ανατολή 
ταιριάζει, και πολλοί χάρτες της περιοχής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación de la punta de la potencia que 
representa la geografía de el Oriente Medio, incluye ideas en los 
paradigmas geográficos, donde y cómo el Oriente Medio cabe adentro, 
y muchas correspondencias de la región.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittler-Osten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paradigmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moyen-est</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paradigmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leste médio</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
